thread.title: M&M'S World® Expands Iconic Footprint with New Pop-Up Store in Cleveland, Tennessee
thread.title_full: M&M'S World® Expands Iconic Footprint with New Pop-Up Store in Cleveland, Tennessee - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: M&M'S World® Expands Iconic Footprint with New Pop-Up Store in Cleveland, Tennessee
text:
M&M'S World
New Temporary Retail Location Opens to Celebrate 36 Years of Community Involvement
MT. ARLINGTON, N.J. , Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- M&M'S World®, the retail store dedicated to all things M&M'S®, is opening a M&M'S World pop-up store in Cleveland, Tennessee , featuring iconic M&M'S merchandise and specialty items with a "Made in Cleveland " logo, for a limited time only. All profits from these specially marked "Made in Cleveland " items - T-shirts, water bottles and magnets - will benefit the MainStreet Cleveland community organization to help with the revitalization and promotion of historic downtown Cleveland, Tennessee .
Located at 301 Keith Street, Southwest Cleveland, Tennessee 37311, the M&M'S store will officially open on Wednesday, October 14th with a grand opening ribbon cutting ceremony on Friday, October 16th at 10 a.m. The store will remain open 7 days a week through November 1, 2015 .
M&M'S World Cleveland will feature many of the same iconic items fans can find in the flagship M&M'S World stores in New York , Las Vegas , Orlando , London and Shanghai . Offering a wide range of M&M'S chocolates and merchandise, including apparel, kitchenware, bedding, jewelry, glassware and seasonal and specially designed items, the M&M'S World stores reflect the huge popularity of M&M'S, the world's most popular confectionery brand.
M&M'S World Cleveland store hours are Monday – Saturday from 11 a.m. – 6 p.m. and Sunday from 1 p.m. – 6 p.m. , now through November 1, 2015 . For more information about the M&M'S World Cleveland pop-up store, follow the brand on Facebook ( www.facebook.com/mmsworld ) and Twitter ( www.twitter.com/mmsworldstores ).
About Mars Retail Group
Headquartered in Mt. Arlington, New Jersey , U.S., the Mars Retail Group creates and builds retail businesses that build the brands of Mars, Incorporated. The iconic M&M'S World® stores, located in New York City , Las Vegas , Orlando , London , and Shanghai , currently represent Mars' largest retail business. MRG also operates the company's Licensing and My M&M'S businesses, as well as the gourmet chocolate business that is sold under the ETHEL M® brand name. Mars Retail Group is a division of Mars, Incorporated.
About M&M'S World®
Offering a wide range of M&M'S® Brand Chocolate Candies and merchandise, the M&M'S World® stores reflect the huge popularity of M&M'S®, the world's most popular confectionery brand. The stores' merchandise includes apparel, kitchenware, plush, and glassware, as well as seasonal items and specially-designed M&M'S® branded items that reflect the personalities of the cities -- Las Vegas , New York City , Orlando , Henderson ( Nevada ), London and Shanghai -- where the stores are located.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150715/237076LOGO
